title: List of New Zealand Knights FC records and statistics
text:
<a href="New%20Zealand%20Knights%20FC">New Zealand Knights Football Club</a> was a New Zealand professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Auckland">Auckland</a>. The club was founded in 2004 and played in the <a href="A-League">A-League</a> until they became defunct in 2007.
This list encompasses the records set by New Zealand Knights, their managers and their players. The player records section includes details of the club's leading goalscorers and those who have made most appearances in first-team competitions. The club's attendance records at North Harbour Stadium, their home ground, are also included in the list.
The club's record appearance maker is <a href="Darren%20Bazeley">Darren Bazeley</a>, who made 47 appearances between 2005 and 2007, and the club's record goalscorers are <a href="Jeremy%20Brockie">Jeremy Brockie</a> and <a href="Simon%20Yeo">Simon Yeo</a> who scored 4 goals apiece.

Appearances.
